docs.title: Vector Docs
docs.text: Welcome to the unoffical Vector Documentation! This project aims to be easily accessable and centralised place for infomatation about Vector.

docs.title: How this is structured
docs.text: This documentation is split into 2 main parts, - The Dev section is for unlocked/development robots and aims to document how Victor and VicOS works and how to change things in it. - The User section is for prod/locked robots and aims to provide infomation and tutorials for how to setup and do thing with your Vector.

docs.title: Where to start
docs.text: If your a developer with a unlocked bot, head over to Getting Started to setup and configure your dev enviroment. If your a user, go checkout What's possible to see whats possible with your bot.

docs.title: What's Possible
docs.text:
Even though your bots not unlocked, there are still lots of things you can do with him! There are lots of things you can do like:

  • Use the Python SDK
    • Control and drive him around
    • Make him say things or throw his cube around
  • Setup Wire-Pod
    • Setup Custom Voice Commands in it
  • Install and try out older firmwares
    • Some favourites of mine are:
      • 1.6 (Last anki firmware)
      • 1.4 (Snow globe!)
  • Use Alexa
